resources.string: City of Issue ex: Dubai, Abu Dhabi
Welcome to the info page of the Assigned Teams page! \n

The Assigned Teams page displays the teams designated to you, the judge, by the Organizer of the event. 
 Please click on a team's card in order to mark the team according to the five categories, by dragging the scroller and assigning a numerical mark. 
 The voting procedures are conducted through two rounds: 
 	 • The first round determines which teams progress to the second round. 
 	 • Once the second round teams are confirmed by the organizer, you, the judge will be able to mark the newly progressed teams.
The teams are split according to the category they compete in: \n
Swipe right or left on the teams display area in order to flip between teams assigned to each category \n The category will be highlighted upon your selection \n
Scroll from the top to refresh the assigned team: \n

The Organizer has the ability to assign and de-assigned teams to you, the judge. 
 In order to assure marking validity and correctness, please feel free to pull down from whatver tab you're in, to refresh the teams 
 The Refresh icon you'll see after pulling down looks something like this:
Thank you for downloading and using TSMS Judge!\n

We, at Team One, developed a comprehensive Event Management System known as TSMS (Trade Show Management System) \n We, Shamsudeen Abubakr, Mahdiyyah Juma, Mustafa Waleed AlSaadi, & Teng Keng, would like to extend our gratitute for the people who empowered us to accomplish this CSCI321 Project!
Welcome to the info page of the All Teams page! \n

The All Teams page displays all the teams participating in the event. 
 The teams have registered through the TSMS Website 
 Please click on a team's card in order to view the team's details such as: 
 	 • Team Name 
 	 • Project Name 
 	 • Project Abstract 
 	 • Team Members 
 	 • Project Image
The teams are split according to the category they registered in: \n
Swipe right or left on the teams display area in order to views between teams to each category \n The category will be highlighted upon your selection \n
Scroll from the top to refresh teams: \n
In order to refresh the teams, please don\'t hesitate to pull down from your teams\' list \n The Refresh icon you\'ll see after pulling down looks something like this: \n
Welcome to the info page of the Timeline! \n

The Timeline displays the agenda for the day as specified by th event's Organizer. 
 As you, the judge, is able to see, the circle to the right of the screen encircles the time and the AM/PM format of said time 
 To your right, is the Agenda for that point in time
Scroll from the top to refresh Timeline entries: \n
In order to refresh the Timeline, please don\'t hesitate to pull down from your teams\' list \n The Refresh icon you\'ll see after pulling down looks something like this: \n
Welcome to the info page of Chat! \n

The Chat allows the different personnel involved in the event to communicate with one another through their dedicated application \n As you, the judge, you\'re able to chat with the main organizer of the event, as well as, other organizers invovled in the event. \n
Welcome to the info page of Parking! \n

The Parking page allows you, the Judge, to input your car info, in order for you to be reserved an underground parking on the day of the event 
 Please fill the fields, with the car you're going to be driving on the day of the event, as such: 
 	 • Car License Plate Number, as in the number on your car's license plate, no letters needed :) 
 	 • License Plate Source, as the city where your car is registered 
 		 ‣ If your car is not registered in a UAE city, please choose "Other" 	 • Car Color, please choose your car's color to the closest match from the list 
 	 • Owner name, Please enter your name
